content: with slip_stitch 6 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch 12 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in back loop only blo of ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 4 chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet 1 double_crochet in unused loop of st in round below skip next single_crochet behind this st *single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 double_crochet in unused lp of stin round below skip next single_crochet behind this st repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 24 sts round 5 chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in blo of same st single_crochet in blo of next st *2 single_crochet in blo of next st single_crochet in blo of next st repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 36 sts round 6 repeat round 4 36 sts 2 round 7 chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in blo of same st 1 single_crochet in blo of next 2 single_crochet *2 single_crochet in blo of next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in blo of next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 48 sts round 8 repeat round 4 48 sts round 9 chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in blo of same st 1 single_crochet in blo of next 3 single_crochet *2 single_crochet in blo of next single_crochet 1 in blo of next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 60 sts round 10 repeat round 4 60 sts round 11 chain 1 single_crochet in blo of each st around join with slip_stitch 60 sts round 12 chain 1 double_crochet in unused lp of st in round below single_crochet in next st *1 double_crochet in unused loop of single_crochet in round below skip single_crochet behind this st single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 60 sts round 13 chain 1 single_crochet in blo of ea st around join with slip_stitch 60 sts repeat rnds 10-13 until hat measures approx 10 from top ending on round 10 or 12 last round chain 1 single_crochet loosely through both loops of each st around 60 sts fasten_off weave in ends turn up cuff copyright 2017 2005 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
